title: Issue with zlib Vulnerability in CI/CD Pipeline (GitLab)
text:
Problem

I’m encountering an issue in my GitLab CI/CD pipeline related to a critical vulnerability in the zlib1g library (CVE-2023-45853). The vulnerability was flagged during the container security scan. Below are the details:

Environment

CI/CD Pipeline: GitLab CI

Vulnerable Library: zlib1g (version 1:1.2.13.dfsg-1)

Vulnerability Status: will_not_fix

What I've Tried So Far:

Upgrading zlib1g: Tried apt-get upgrade -y zlib1g, but no fix is available since the package status is "will_not_fix."

Documentation Check: Reviewed Librem5 zlib1g documentation for any alternative patches.

Python Upgrade: Updated Python to version 3.11, but the issue persists.

Dependency Review: Collaborated with a teammate to check for any direct dependencies on zlib1g—none were identified.

Exploring Alternatives: Looked into alternative libraries or patched versions of zlib1g without success.

Question

How can I resolve or mitigate this issue? Is there a way to patch the vulnerability manually, or do I need to wait for an official update? Are there alternative strategies to address this in a CI/CD pipeline?

Additional Details:

Base Image: [debian:12]

Security Scanner: [Trivy, GitLab's scanner]

Steps Taken: Investigated patched versions or backports but found none that resolve this CVE.

Feel free to ask any questions or request more details. I’m happy to share anything that might help you assist me better.

title: .net Maui Visual Studio 2022 Mac ssh Issue
text:
My system: Win 11 23h2 with Visual Studio 2022 17.13.6 Mac Mini M4 15.4.1 current Xcode reinstalled without any other software or settings. Connected via LAN

I have the following problem: I want to create a multiplatform APP with .net Maui. After creating the project, I would like to connect my Visual Studio to the Mac. I have set up everything on the Mac as described. It also finds the MAC on the network. The fingerprint is transmitted and I can enter the user and password. Then it tries to establish the connection and then says that it does not work.

I have tried to establish a connection from the Windows PC via cmd(ssh1) and via Putty(ssh2). Works without any problems. Then I looked at the log of the sshd Deamon. Only one entry was added via cmd and Putty. If I try to establish a ssh connection via VS, I get 20 or more entries for a connection within a few seconds until the ssh daemon crashes. You can only reconnect after restarting the daemon. You can also see in Wireshark that it goes back and forth wildly when VS tries to establish a connection. Until the Ssh server no longer responds.

I have changed to VS 17.10.4 and it’s the same problem. With my MacBook 15.3 it has at least made some progress when connecting via Visual Studio.

I have read that there is a security fix for OpenSsh CVE-2025-24246 in 15.4, but even with 15.3 I did not reach my goal. Does anyone have an idea or the same problem?

title: Apache Struts 6 file upload returns null
text:
I am upgrading our legacy application from Apache Struts 2.5.33 to 6.7.0 to remediate the file upload vulnerability CVE-2024-53677. I have reviewed the following guides:

https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/Struts+2.5+to+6.0.0+migration

https://struts.apache.org/core-developers/action-file-upload-interceptor

The below struts.xml content works with fileUpload interceptor but fails with actionFileUpload as the form content values are coming back null after the file is selected.

I am not familiar with Struts and not sure where to begin so just seeking advice on some things I should check.

<package name="abc-default" extends="struts-default,json-default">
...

<action name="*valueTemplate" class="com.companyname.abc.actions.ValueTemplateFilesAction" method="{1}">
    <interceptor-ref name="actionFileUpload"/>
    <interceptor-ref name="abc-default">
        <param name="className">com.companyname.abc.forms.ValueTemplateFilesForm</param>
        <param name="name">valueTemplateFilesForm</param>
        <param name="scopedModelDrive.scope">request</param>
    <interceptor-ref>
    <result name="target" type="tiles">time_admin_uploadValue</result>
    <allowed-methods>uploadFiles,loadPage,markFileActive,downloadTemplate</allowed-methods>
</action>

title: How to remove vulnerability detected for springframework/spring-beans/5.0.5.RELEASE/spring-beans-5.0.5.RELEASE.jar
text:
I'm not using Spring framework in the project But IT team identified the vulnerability with below details:

Please refer to the specific details in each line item below. We have identified multiple vulnerabilities (CVEs) starting with 'CVE'. Resolved CVE :No Data Available CVE:CVE-2022-22965 CVSS score :9.8 CVSS severity :CRITICAL Package name :Version:5.0.5.RELEASE PackageName:spring-beans-5.0.5.RELEASE.jar (5.0.5.RELEASE): org.springframework:spring-beans Non OS packages:/C:/Users/username/.m2/repository/org/springframework/spring-beans/5.0.5.RELEASE/spring-beans-5.0.5.RELEASE.jar,/C:/Users/username/.m2/repository/org/springframework/spring-beans/5.0.5.RELEASE/spring-beans-5.0.5.RELEASE.jar Patch Version :5.2.20.RELEASE, 5.3.18 Fix available State:Yes Published date:2022-04-01

Please find below pom.xml with dependencies, which of the below responsible for downloading springframework/spring-beans/5.0.5.RELEASE?
